mapper.select: select F_USER_ID, F_GAME_ID, F_ACCOUNTS, sum(F_PAY_PRICE) as F_PAY_PRICE, sum(F_CARD_GOLD) as F_CARD_GOLD, CONVERT(F_CREATE_TIME, DATE) as F_CREATE_TIME from t_pay_order where F_SYS_FLAG = 1 and CONVERT(F_CREATE_TIME, DATE) = CONVERT(#{createTime}, DATE) group by F_GAME_ID, CONVERT(F_CREATE_TIME, DATE) order by F_CREATE_TIME asc
